title: I Found Something Unusual in an OPGG Replay
body:
I was trying to spectate an OPGG game on the EUW server and as it occasionally does the game freezes and you either have to reload it or look for a different replay. 

Before closing the client I noticed this
http://s28.postimg.org/90e0md1ul/image.png

here are backup pictures in case you think I edited it or something
http://s15.postimg.org/6w92rdj57/image.png
http://s16.postimg.org/6ejdyj005/image.png

replies.body: Looks like a corrupt replay, try re-downloading.
Naw TF just fused with Rek Sai and now they are ulting.
